summary: Iteration 71: Draggable columns and dynamic column definitions in inventory table - All features verified working. Dynamic columns render correctly per catalog type (All/PCA/Public/Archived). Drag-and-drop column reordering works with localStorage persistence per catalog type. Name column is sticky (non-draggable). Column resize, sorting, and bulk actions all working.
passed_tests: Dynamic columns for 'All' tab: Name, Code/SKU, Grade, Category, Publisher/Brand, Price, Stock, Status
Dynamic columns for 'PCA Textbooks' tab: Book Name, Code, Grade, Subject, Publisher, Price, Stock, Status
Dynamic columns for 'Public Store' tab: Product Name, SKU, Category, Type, Brand, Price, Stock, Status
Dynamic columns for 'Archived' tab: Same as All view
Column headers (except sticky name) show grip icon and are draggable
Drag-and-drop column reordering works (verified Grade moved after Subject/Publisher)
Column order persisted to localStorage per catalog type (chipi_inv_col_order key)
Name column is NOT draggable (draggable='false') and has sticky CSS class
Column resize handles present (9 resize handles with cursor-col-resize)
Sorting works when clicking column headers (Price sort verified)
Bulk select shows action bar with Set Active, Set Inactive, Archive buttons
All 4 catalog type buttons present: All, PCA Textbooks, Public Store, Archived
critical_code_review_comments: COLUMN_DEFS object at line 23-54 correctly defines columns per catalog type (pca, public, all, archived)
ResizableHeader component correctly handles draggable attribute based on isSticky prop
GripVertical icon properly rendered for non-sticky columns
loadColumnOrder/saveColumnOrder functions correctly persist to localStorage with chipi_inv_col_order key
activeColumns memo correctly reorders columns based on saved order from columnOrders state
seed_data_creation: None - used existing 14 PCA products and 1 public product
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 71 tested draggable columns feature. Navigation: Admin (/admin#unatienda) > Inventory tab (default). Catalog type filter: data-testid='catalog-all/pca/public/archived'. Column order is stored in localStorage key 'chipi_inv_col_order' with structure like {"pca":["name","code",...],...}. Name column is sticky (non-draggable). 15 total products in inventory (14 PCA + 1 public). Auth token must be stored in localStorage with key 'auth_token' (not 'token').
